entry.title: Hello,World!
entry.content:
Last login: Thu Jul 11 08:57:17 on ttys001 yangmatoMacBook-Pro:~ yanghajimeasa$ rvm install 1.9.3 —with-gcc=clang Installing requirements for osx, might require sudo password. Password: DEBUG: Copying /Users/yanghajimeasa/Library/Preferences/com.apple.dt.Xcode.plist to /opt/local/var/macports/home/Library/Preferences DEBUG: MacPorts sources location: /opt/local/var/macports/sources/rsync.macports.org/release/tarballs —–> Updating MacPorts base sources using rsync receiving file list … done

To upgrade your installed ports, you should run port upgrade outdated Installing required packages: libyaml, readline, libksba, openssl, curl-ca-bundle, sqlite3, zlib…………………………………………………………. 0 296 0 0 0 0 0 0 —:—:— 0:00:04 —:—:— 0 8914 296 8914 26388 0 0 6159 0 —:—:— 0:00:04 —:—:— 6159 Downloaded archive checksum did not match, archive was removed! If you wish to continue with not matching download add ‘—verify-downloads 2’ after the command.

To upgrade your installed ports, you should run -bash: The: command not found yangmatoMacBook-Pro:~ yanghajimeasa$ rvm install 1.9.3 —with-gcc=clang Installing requirements for osx, might require sudo password. yangmatoMacBook-Pro:~ yanghajimeasa$ rvm use 1.9.3 —default
Using /Users/yanghajimeasa/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448 yangmatoMacBook-Pro:~ yanghajimeasa$ cd octopress You are using ‘.rvmrc’, it requires trusting, it is slower and it is not compatible with other ruby managers, you can switch to ‘.ruby-version’ using ‘rvm rvmrc to [.]ruby-version’ or ignore this warning with ‘rvm rvmrc warning ignore /Users/yanghajimeasa/octopress/.rvmrc’, ‘.rvmrc’ will continue to be the default project file in RVM 1 and RVM 2, to ignore the warning for all files run ‘rvm rvmrc warning ignore all.rvmrcs’.

Using /Users/yanghajimeasa/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448 yangmatoMacBook-Pro:octopress yanghajimeasa$ gem install bundler Fetching: bundler-1.3.5.gem (100%) Successfully installed bundler-1.3.5 Installing ri documentation for bundler-1.3.5 1 gem installed yangmatoMacBook-Pro:octopress yanghajimeasa$ bundle install Fetching gem metadata from https://rubygems.org/…….. Fetching gem metadata from https://rubygems.org/.. Resolving dependencies… Using rake (0.9.2.2) Installing RedCloth (4.2.9) Installing chunky_png (1.2.5) Installing fast-stemmer (1.0.1) Installing classifier (1.3.3) Installing fssm (0.2.9) Installing sass (3.2.9) Installing compass (0.12.2) Installing directory_watcher (1.4.1) Installing haml (3.1.7) Installing kramdown (0.13.8) Installing liquid (2.3.0) Installing syntax (1.0.0) Installing maruku (0.6.1) Installing posix-spawn (0.3.6) Installing yajl-ruby (1.1.0) Installing pygments.rb (0.3.4) Installing jekyll (0.12.0) Installing rack (1.5.2) Installing rack-protection (1.5.0) Installing rb-fsevent (0.9.1) Installing rdiscount (2.0.7.3) Installing rubypants (0.2.0) Installing sass-globbing (1.0.0) Installing tilt (1.3.7) Installing sinatra (1.4.2) Installing stringex (1.4.0) Using bundler (1.3.5) Your bundle is complete! Use bundle show [gemname] to see where a bundled gem is installed. yangmatoMacBook-Pro:octopress yanghajimeasa$ rake install

Copying classic theme into ./source and ./sass

mkdir -p source cp -r .themes/classic/source/. source mkdir -p sass cp -r .themes/classic/sass/. sass mkdir -p source/_posts mkdir -p public yangmatoMacBook-Pro:octopress yanghajimeasa$ rake setup_github_pages
Enter the read/write url for your repository (For example, ‘git@github.com:your_username/your_username.github.io)

       or 'https://github.com/your_username/your_username.github.io')

Repository url: git@github.com:YbStudio/ybstudio.github.com.git Added remote git@github.com:YbStudio/ybstudio.github.com.git as origin Set origin as default remote Master branch renamed to ‘source’ for committing your blog source files rm -rf deploy mkdir deploy cd deploy Initialized empty Git repository in /Users/yanghajimeasa/octopress/deploy/.git/ [master (root-commit) 916dbc3] Octopress init Committer: Yb Studio yanghajimeasa@yangmatoMacBook-Pro.local Your name and email address were configured automatically based on your username and hostname. Please check that they are accurate. You can suppress this message by setting them explicitly:

git config --global user.name "Your Name"
git config --global user.email you@example.com

After doing this, you may fix the identity used for this commit with:

git commit --amend --reset-author

1 file changed, 1 insertion(+) create mode 100644 index.html cd –

Now you can deploy to http://YbStudio.github.io with rake deploy

yangmatoMacBook-Pro:octopress yanghajimeasa$ rake generate

Generating Site with Jekyll

directory source/stylesheets/ create source/stylesheets/screen.css Configuration from /Users/yanghajimeasa/octopress/_config.yml Building site: source –> public Successfully generated site: source –> public yangmatoMacBook-Pro:octopress yanghajimeasa$ rake setup_github_pages Enter the read/write url for your repository (For example, ‘git@github.com:your_username/your_username.github.io)

       or 'https://github.com/your_username/your_username.github.io')

Repository url: git@github.com:YbStudio/ybstudio.github.com.git rm -rf deploy mkdir deploy cd deploy Initialized empty Git repository in /Users/yanghajimeasa/octopress/deploy/.git/ [master (root-commit) cfcb559] Octopress init Committer: Yb Studio yanghajimeasa@yangmatoMacBook-Pro.local Your name and email address were configured automatically based on your username and hostname. Please check that they are accurate. You can suppress this message by setting them explicitly:

git config --global user.name "Your Name"
git config --global user.email you@example.com

After doing this, you may fix the identity used for this commit with:

git commit --amend --reset-author

1 file changed, 1 insertion(+) create mode 100644 index.html cd –

Now you can deploy to http://YbStudio.github.io with rake deploy

yangmatoMacBook-Pro:octopress yanghajimeasa$ git add . git commit -m ‘your message’
error: unknown switch `m’ usage: git add [options] [—] …

-n, --dry-run         dry run
-v, --verbose         be verbose

-i, --interactive     interactive picking
-p, --patch           select hunks interactively
-e, --edit            edit current diff and apply
-f, --force           allow adding otherwise ignored files
-u, --update          update tracked files
-N, --intent-to-add   record only the fact that the path will be added later
-A, --all             add changes from all tracked and untracked files
--refresh             don't add, only refresh the index
--ignore-errors       just skip files which cannot be added because of errors
--ignore-missing      check if - even missing - files are ignored in dry run

yangmatoMacBook-Pro:octopress yanghajimeasa$ git push origin source The authenticity of host ‘github.com (204.232.175.90)’ can’t be established. RSA key fingerprint is 16:27:ac:a5:76:28:2d:36:63:1b:56:4d:eb:df:a6:48. Are you sure you want to continue connecting (yes/no)? y Please type ‘yes’ or ‘no’: yes Warning: Permanently added ‘github.com,204.232.175.90’ (RSA) to the list of known hosts. Counting objects: 4511, done. Delta compression using up to 4 threads. Compressing objects: 100% (1657/1657), done. Writing objects: 100% (4511/4511), 1.04 MiB, done. Total 4511 (delta 2589), reused 4349 (delta 2491) To git@github.com:YbStudio/ybstudio.github.com.git * [new branch] source –> source yangmatoMacBook-Pro:octopress yanghajimeasa$ rake new_post[“标题”] mkdir -p source/posts Creating new post: source/posts/2013-07-11-biao-ti.markdown yangmatoMacBook-Pro:octopress yanghajimeasa$ rake new_post[“Hello,World!”] -bash: !“]: event not found yangmatoMacBook-Pro:octopress yanghajimeasa$ rake new_post[“Hello,World”] mkdir -p source/posts Creating new post: source/posts/2013-07-11-hello.markdown yangmatoMacBook-Pro:octopress yanghajimeasa$
